They claimed in the product description that it was 95% cotton and 5% spandex, but when I got the shirt it felt like pure plastic. Turns out they can't lie on the tags and it is made of 95% POLYESTER, NOT cotton. And 5% elastane! It also sat weird, didn't look soft or cozy at all, and the sleeves were really tight when the body of the shirt fit fine (i have very skinny arms so this was a shock to me) but it was very see through. Would not buy again, returning ASAP. My theory is they are dropshipping someone else's shirts, or they're just lying.

I got a medium, which I wear in most clothes, and it was tight enough to suffocate. I've been wearing it to bed and it's slowly stretching it enough to where I can breathe and actually wear it in public lol. Size up. Very cute, decently comfortable, not transparent.
